overview:
Volker Glaeser is an Internet and media executive with 20 years of experience including general management, business operations, product and content development, and content production.

Glaeser serves as GM Germany and Group COO of Mondia Media Group (formerly Bertelsmann Arvato Mobile) in Hamburg, Germany. Mondia is a world leader in digital content management for mobile devices and an eCommerce & mCommerce specialist for entertainment content.

He joined Mondia from Vodafone D2 in Germany, one of Europe’s largest telco operators, where he held the position of eCommerce Director and Company Officer with Statutory Authority. He led the German Internet portal businesses for PC and mobile (Consumer and Enterprise) and ran Vodafone360 and live!, including Mobile Advertising, Apps, Music, Games, and Mobile TV.

Held the position of Global Head of Online from 2007-2009. Oversaw Vodafone Online sales as well as transaction partnerships and the geographical expansion of Vodafone’s eCommerce platforms.

Before joining Vodafone, member of the European Leadership Team of Yahoo! Consumer Search, managing the German speaking markets. Prior to that, member of the Yahoo! Germany Management Team. Led extension of all information, entertainment and community products.

Volker Glaeser holds an Executive MBA with distinction from Danube Business School, Krems/Austria.
